it.polimi.se2018.model

Interface PlacementRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdjacentColorPlacementRuleDecorator, AdjacentDicePlacementRuleDecorator, AdjacentValuePlacementRuleDecorator, BorderPlacementRuleDecorator, ColorPlacementRuleDecorator, ColorRestrictionPlacementRuleDecorator, EmptyPlacementRule, NotAdjacentDicePlacementRuleDecorator, PlacementRuleDecorator, ValuePlacementRuleDecorator

    public interface PlacementRule
    Interface for placement rule definition. Placement rules are to be composed via the decorator pattern by adding up single, independent constraints.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Minto

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMoveAllowed(WindowPattern windowPattern, Dice dice, int row, int col)
      Checks if the move specified by a given Dice and a position (row and col) is allowed on the given WindowPattern.

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveAllowed

        boolean isMoveAllowed(WindowPattern windowPattern,
                      Dice dice,
                      int row,
                      int col)
        Checks if the move specified by a given Dice and a position (row and col) is allowed on the given WindowPattern.
        Parameters:
        windowPattern - the window pattern on which the move is played.
        dice - the dice to be placed.
        row - the row index of the cell where the dice is to be placed.
        col - the column index of the cell where the dice is to be placed.
        Returns:
        whether or not the move is allowed.
